glsa.title: Online-Bookmarks: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been reported in Online-Bookmarks.

background.p: Online-Bookmarks is a web-based bookmark management system to store your bookmarks, favorites and links.

ul.li: Authentication bypass when directly requesting certain pages (CVE-2004-2155).
Insufficient input validation in the login function in auth.inc (CVE-2006-6358).

impact.p: A remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities to bypass authentication mechanisms, execute arbitrary SQL statements or inject arbitrary web scripts.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Online-Bookmarks users should upgrade to the latest version:
